tool_description: Performs comprehensive quality assurance validation of battery replacement including performance metrics, safety checks, and functionality verification.

device_model.description: Device model that underwent battery replacement

charge_test_duration.description: Duration of charge test in minutes

discharge_test_duration.description: Duration of discharge test in minutes

temperature_readings.description: Temperature readings during testing in Celsius

functional_tests_passed.description: List of functional tests that passed

error_messages: Invalid device model: Provide a valid device model for quality standards.
Voltage out of acceptable range: Battery voltage must be within 3.0-4.5V for mobile devices.
Test duration insufficient: Charge and discharge tests must be at least 10 minutes each.
Temperature readings required: At least one temperature reading must be provided.
Excessive temperature detected: Temperature readings exceed safe operating limits (>45Â°C).
No functional tests specified: At least one functional test result must be provided.
Critical safety failure: Device failed safety checks and cannot be returned to service.
Charging current out of range: Charging current must be appropriate for battery capacity.
usage: Input all test results including voltage, timing, temperature, and functional test outcomes. The tool validates against quality standards and safety requirements.

overall_pass_status.description: Whether repair passed all quality assurance checks

failed_criteria.description: List of quality criteria that failed

safety_compliance.description: Whether repair meets safety compliance standards

performance_rating.description: Performance rating: excellent, good, acceptable, poor

warranty_eligible.description: Whether repair qualifies for warranty coverage
